snippet.title: Star Horizon Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Get your copy now!
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/star-horizon/id814466047
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tabascointeractive.starhorizon
Amazon AppStore: http://goo.gl/vfdEua


The Inter Galactic Corporation (also known as the Federation) which controls almost the entire galaxy is fighting the Rebels, who try to free themselves from its influence. 

Federation is about to turn the tide of the war but then things start to go wrong. Mothership is destroyed and Ellie puts John into hibernation for 1000 years. Now he will have to discover what really happened and maybe, but just maybe, save the galaxy.

• Take part to intense and immersive space battles thanks to a dynamic and intuitive handling ability of your spaceship
• Choose your side: fight for the Federation or the Rebels
• Write your own galactic story and master your destiny
• Upgrade your ship and weapons to finish your enemies in multiple astonish ways
• Follow the relationship between the man and the machine spiced up with absurd and dark humor
• Discover a wild variety of spaceships and fleet
• Use your handling ability to unlock achievements

More information:
http://tabascointeractive.com
https://www.facebook.com/TabascoInteractive
https://twitter.com/tabascocrew
